Package org.example.presentationLayer

Class ControllerAdmin

java.lang.Object
org.example.presentationLayer.ControllerAdmin
public class ControllerAdmin
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    ControllerAdmin()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addProducts_onClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    method that will open new pages based on the button that was clicked -> will open either a base prod page or a composite one -> where a new product will be created
    void button_onClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    This method deals with opening another page, corresponding to the pressed button it will open another ui and then erase the current page, in order to not have at the end multiple pages of the same type
    void deleteProducts_onClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
    method that will delete a product from the table it will get the selected item from the table and the delivery service class will delete the object from the file and the object will also be erased from the table
    void importProducts_onClicked()
    method that will extract and show the initial products from the .csv file the extraction is done by the deliveryService class the controller only displays on the screen all the data
    void initialize()
    method that will be called each time a page is opened sets that table columns and the items at the begining
    void modifyProducts_onClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    method that will select a certain menuItem to be modified and the modify it it will also set visible some fields needed for inputing the data
    void openReports()
    Method that will open another page with all the reports that will be generated by the administrator

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
